name: 黃乾怡
objective: This course provides a fundamental understanding of statistical quality control concept. Areas for quality implementation will include functions such as marketing, design, purchasing, production, inspection, etc. This class also enables the students to recognize the foundation to create and sustain an effective organization through total quality management.
schedule:
1　　　　Introduction to quality
2　　　　Total quality management – principle and practice
3~4　　　　Total quality management – tools and techniques
5~6　　　　Fundamental of statistics
7　　　　Control charts for variables
8　　　　Control charts for attributes
9　　　　Midterm Exam
10　　　　Lot by acceptance sampling by attribute
11　　　　Acceptance sampling systems
12~13　　　　Reliability
14　　　　Electronics quality & reliability (Invited speaker from industry)
15~17　　　　Term report
18　　　　Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Evaluation and Grading Policy:
1.　　Midterm Exam: 30 %
2.　　Term Report: 50%
3.　　Participation /attendance 20%
materials: Quality Control; D. Besterfield; Pearson Education; 2009
